title: [SOLVED]820-2915 Another strange issue with display
message:
So I'm back with weird mbp. So when i got this machine the lvds connector pins were smashed and the solder was touching, other than that everything seemed to work except the screen had a green tint to it. I tried 3 different and known good screens and lvds cables all of which do something different with the video out. was thinking this was a bad lvds connector, so i changed it out to only discover the issue is still the same. Ive ran ASD 3S144 it passes everything. on external the video is perfect.

Not really sure where to go on this now. Any ideas?

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 Another strange issue with display
message: Picture please. Measure all LVDS lines at the connector in diode mode and report values.

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 Another strange issue with display
message: You numbered the wrong way, but anyway. Your 11 and 12, which are really 29 and 30 are off. They should be .448 like all other LVDS lines, check again. Also your pin 4 which is really 37 should have nothing, looks like crappy soldering to me.

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 Another strange issue with display
message: oops my bad i change the list i made to the correct order. i remeasured again and 30 has .459 now and 29 is o drop to ground. and pin 37 has .653. ill take better pic for you to verify the solder job.

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 Another strange issue with display
message: Pull L9011 and do the measurements again on pin 1 and 4 of L9011.

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 Another strange issue with display
message:
sooo. update to this issue. i took this board into apple and it failed vst and is covered under the quality care program. so i guess case solved?

thanks for all your help duke.
